title: 个人简介
text:
研究兴趣方向
#| echo: false library(ggplot2) library(ggwordcloud)
set.seed(2024) df <- data.frame( term = c(“水处理技术”, “环境监测”, “污染物迁移”, “CAD工程设计”, “SPSS数据分析”, “环境政策”), freq = c(18, 15, 12, 10, 8, 6) )
ggplot(df, aes(label = term, size = freq)) + geom_text_wordcloud(shape = “circle”, color = c(“#2d4059”, “#ea5455”, “#f07b3f”, “#3f72af”, “#45b7d1”, “#7bc043”)) + scale_size_area(max_size = 14) + theme_minimal()
